name: Fool's Cup
description:
Fool's Cup is a physics-based medieval  tournament where you compete in a series of chaotic minigames against other people as king's fools to be the best fool in the realm.

All artworks, characters, sounds, and gameplay ideas are developed and created for the Epic MegaJam 2021 within 7 days.

There are 2 levels in the game: King's Chamber and Golden Apple.

In King's Chamber players try to fill the King's table with fool as time goes while preventing each other to do so, at the end of the level the player with the highest score wins. You win scores every time you put something on the King's Table. Yo get stunned if you make stuff fall from the table.

In Golden Apple the aim is to have the golden apple as long as you can while other players are trying to take it from you and the level is running out of space.

***HOW TO PLAY***

Move Around : W-A-S-D

Take / Drop Food : Double Click LMB

Push Other Players : RMB
